transcript: Well, the plan was, you know, to kind of sneak up on you over a period of a week or so, but they take it for granted the world set.

segments.text: Well, the plan was, you know, to kind of sneak up on you over a period of a week or so, but they take it for granted the world set.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Well the plan was to kind of sneak up on you over a period of a week or so.  But uh- they take it for granted that we're all set.
